entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
